Sentencas: Cuprates with perovskite-related structure and the general formula La(1-x)A(x)Cu(1-y)B(y)O(2.5+/-delta) (A=Ca, Ba, Sr; B=Li; x=0.1, 0.2, 0.3; y=0, 0.1) were prepared by the citrate route.
Titulo: Effect of aliovalent doping on the transport properties of lanthanum cuprates

Sentencas: Their structures were studied by X-ray powder diffraction and their electrical conductivities (as a function of temperature) by four-point DC measurements on sintered bars.
Titulo: Effect of aliovalent doping on the transport properties of lanthanum cuprates

Sentencas: The highest values of electrical conductivity were observed for the x=0.3 Sr-doped cuprate, which showed a metallike temperature dependence.
Titulo: Effect of aliovalent doping on the transport properties of lanthanum cuprates

Sentencas: Ba-doped cuprates showed a transition from semi-conducting to metallic temperature dependence of conductivity.
Titulo: Effect of aliovalent doping on the transport properties of lanthanum cuprates

Sentencas: The extent of A-site deficiency is small and had the effect of slightly decreasing the conductivity and thermal expansion coefficient.
Titulo: Effect of aliovalent doping on the transport properties of lanthanum cuprates

Sentencas: Li solubility was also found to be small, but it reduced conductivity drastically, due in part to the disruption of the copper-oxygen conductive network.
Titulo: Effect of aliovalent doping on the transport properties of lanthanum cuprates

Sentencas: Reactions between cuprates and a typical manganite fuel cell cathode, and Pt and Pd contacts were observed at 1,000 degrees C.
Titulo: Effect of aliovalent doping on the transport properties of lanthanum cuprates
